attributes.action: Reduce the standard rate of VAT at 17.5% to 12%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this will allow the tax paying consumer to decide what they want to do with their tax money and not Government pledging it all for us.

The reduction of the standard rate of VAT in the UK is not only support by Britains leading economists but those worldwide support it as a firm move to help out tax payers in these difficult times.
